subtitle: Serve with baby jacket potatoes and cabbage.

method.text: Season the inside of the poussins. Mix together the butter and thyme. Spread over the poussins.

Put the birds in a roasting pan and roast for 45-50 min, basting occasionally. Cover with foil towards the end of the cooking time if they are starting to brown too much. Remove the string. Transfer to a warmed serving plate. Cover with foil and keep warm.

To make the grape sauce: Boil the port in a small pan until reduced by half. Remove excess fat from the roasting tin. Add the stock and boil for 2 min over a high heat, stirring to dissolve the pan sediment. Blend the arrowroot with the cream, then whisk into the simmering stock. Strain into the reduced port. Add the grapes to the sauce. Season. Simmer for 1 min, stirring all the time.
Spoon some sauce and grapes onto each serving plate with the poussin. Serve the remaining sauce separately.

title: Thyme roasted poussins with grape sauce
